ExampleDefinition.Description:
Using garish colors to demonstrate Xaml styling of a SciChart3DSurface, Axis, grid lines, tick lines and background.
Almost any element in SciChart3D is stylable in Xaml and most parts of the chart are templated. You can easily set background, grid-line, axis label, viewport background and chart series colors in Xaml.
Take a look at the source-code of this example for further details.
